Methods in gameelements that throw IllegalMoveException
 void Game.makeMove(Player player, Position move)
          Applies move to the current game situation.
protected  void Game.processTurn()
          Switches active player on every turn, asks current player for next move, proceeds with move and counts up the turn number.
 void Game.validateMove(Player player, Position move)
          Checks, if a players move is valid: throw an exception, if inactive player tries to move or if a player tries an illegal move.
